DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate time progression ( TTP ) PSA patient high risk prostate cancer definitive therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Adjuvant Taxotere Patients With High Risk Prostate Cancer Post Prostatectomy Radiation
DOC.criteria: Patients undergone radical prostatectomy ( unmeasurable PSA ) radiation therapy prostate cancer high risk disease define one following : Node positive disease postoperatively Capsule involvement Seminal Vesicles involvement Gleason score ≥ 8 > 50 % core biopsy positive Clinical Stage T2c T3 Preop PSA > 15 plus Gleason score 7 Age great 18 ECOG Performance Status 01 Serum creatinine < = 1.5 mg/dl Granulocyte count > = 1500/m3 , Hemoglobin > 8.0 g/dl , platelet count > = 100,000/m3 Total bilirubin < = ULN AST , ALT Alkaline Phosphatase must within range allow eligibility . Signed patient inform consent . Men childbearing potential must willing consent use effective contraception treatment three month thereafter . Peripheral neuropathy > grade 1 History severe hypersensitivity Taxotere® drug formulate polysorbate 80 . Patients receive previous chemotherapy treat another clinical trial use investigational agent . Active infection within 14 day begin treatment Patients serious illness medical condition , history significant neurologic psychiatric active infection . Patients current malignancy . Patients prior history situ lobular carcinoma breast , basal squamous cell skin cancer , eligible .
